paper_abstract: The structure, stability, and the IR, and EPR spectroscopic properties of bis(methoxyacetato)diaquocopper(II) were studied both experimentally using FT-IR and theoretically using B3LYP/6-31G**, B3LYP/6-311G, BWP91/6-31G** methods. The same approaches were used to calculate the harmonic frequencies and to compare them to the experimental solid state values. The g-tensors are calculated using the NMR/GIAO computational method.
paper_title: Structural, IR, and EPR studies of the bis(methoxyacetato) diaquo-copper(II) complex
